members.member:
Performs a complex DFT w/Optimizations for .NET >= 4.
Released under the MIT License
DFT Core Functions Copyright (c) 2016 Steven C. Hageman

DFT Base Class

member.name: M:DSPLib.DFT.#ctor
member.summary: DFT Class

member.name: P:DSPLib.DFT.IsUsingCached
member.summary: Read only Boolean property. True meas the currently defined DFT is using cached memory to speed up calculations.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DFT.Initialize(System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Pre-Initializes the DFT. Must call first and this anytime the FFT setup changes.
member.param: True will force the DFT to not use pre-calculated caching.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DFT.Execute(System.Double[])
member.summary: Execute the DFT for 'real' inputs.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DFT.Execute(System.Numerics.Complex[])
member.summary: Execute the DFT for 'complex' inputs.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DFT.Dft(System.Double[])
member.summary: A brute force DFT for 'real' input data - Uses Task / Parallel pattern

member.name: M:DSPLib.DFT.DftCached(System.Double[])
member.summary: DFT for 'real' input data with Pre-calculated Sin/Cos arrays + Task / Parallel pattern. DFT can only be so big before the computer runs out of memory and has to use the brute force DFT.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DFT.Dft(System.Numerics.Complex[])
member.summary: A brute force DFT for 'complex' input data - Uses Task / Parallel pattern

member.name: M:DSPLib.DFT.DftCached(System.Numerics.Complex[])
member.summary: DFT for 'complex' input data with Pre-calculated Sin/Cos arrays + Task / Parallel pattern. DFT can only be so big before the computer runs out of memory and has to use the brute force DFT.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DFT.FrequencySpan(System.Double)
member.summary: Return the Frequency Array for the currently defined DFT. Takes into account the total number of points and zero padding points that were defined.

members.member:
Performs an in-place complex FFT.
Released under the MIT License
Core FFT class based on, Fast C# FFT - Copyright (c) 2010 Gerald T. Beauregard
Changes to: Interface, scaling, zero padding, return values. Change to .NET Complex output types and integrated with my DSP Library. Note: Complex Number Type requires .NET >= 4.0
These changes as noted above Copyright (c) 2016 Steven C. Hageman
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.
FFT Base Class

member.name: M:DSPLib.FFT.#ctor
member.summary: FFT Class

member.name: M:DSPLib.FFT.Initialize(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Initialize the FFT. Must call first and this anytime the FFT setup changes.

member.name: M:DSPLib.FFT.Execute(System.Double[])
member.summary: Executes a FFT of the REAL input series.

member.name: M:DSPLib.FFT.Execute(System.Numerics.Complex[])
member.summary: Executes a FFT of the COMPLEX input series.

member.name: M:DSPLib.FFT.FrequencySpan(System.Double)
member.summary: Return the Frequency Array for the currently defined FFT. Takes into account the total number of points and zero padding points that were defined.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Generate.LinSpace(System.Double,System.Double,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Generate linearly spaced array. Like the Octave function of the same name. EX: DSP.Generate.LinSpace(1, 10, 10) -> Returns array: 1, 2, 3, 4....10.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Generate.ToneSampling(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.UInt32,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Generates a Sine Wave Tone using Sampling Terms.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Generate.ToneCycles(System.Double,System.Double,System.UInt32,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Generates a Sine Wave Tone using Number of Cycles Terms.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Generate.NoisePsd(System.Double,System.Double,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Generates a normal distribution noise signal of the specified power spectral density (Vrms / rt-Hz).

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Generate.NoiseRms(System.Double,System.UInt32,System.Double)
member.summary: Generates a normal distribution noise signal of the specified Volts RMS.

members.member:
Many of the windows functions are based on the article,
Spectrum and spectral density estimation by the Discrete Fourier transform (DFT), including a comprehensive list of window functions and some new ï¬‚at-top windows.
G. Heinzel, A. Rudiger and R. Schilling, Max-Planck-Institut fur Gravitationsphysik
February 15, 2002

member.name: T:DSPLib.DSP.Window.Type
member.summary: ENUM Types for included Windows.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Window.ScaleFactor.Signal(System.Double[])
member.summary: Calculate Signal scale factor from window coefficient array. Designed to be applied to the "Magnitude" result.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Window.ScaleFactor.Noise(System.Double[],System.Double)
member.summary: Calculate Noise scale factor from window coefficient array. Takes into account the bin width in Hz for the final result also. Designed to be applied to the "Magnitude" result.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Window.ScaleFactor.NENBW(System.Double[])
member.summary: Calculate Normalized, Equivalent Noise BandWidth from window coefficient array.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Window.Coefficients(DSPLib.DSP.Window.Type,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Calculates a set of Windows coefficients for a given number of points and a window type to use.
member.returns: double[] array of the calculated window coefficients

member.name: T:DSPLib.DSP.ConvertMagnitude
member.summary: DFT / FFT Format Conversion Functions

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.ConvertMagnitude.ToMagnitudeSquared(System.Double[])
member.summary: Convert Magnitude FT Result to: Magnitude Squared Format

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.ConvertMagnitude.ToMagnitudeDBV(System.Double[])
member.summary: Convert Magnitude FT Result to: Magnitude dBVolts

member.name: T:DSPLib.DSP.ConvertMagnitudeSquared
member.summary: DFT / FFT Format Conversion Functions

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.ConvertMagnitudeSquared.ToMagnitude(System.Double[])
member.summary: Convert Magnitude Squared FFT Result to: Magnitude Vrms

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.ConvertMagnitudeSquared.ToMagnitudeDBV(System.Double[])
member.summary: Convert Magnitude Squared FFT Result to: Magnitude dBVolts

member.name: T:DSPLib.DSP.ConvertComplex
member.summary: DFT / FFT Format Conversion Functions.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.ConvertComplex.ToMagnitudeSquared(System.Numerics.Complex[])
member.summary: Convert Complex DFT/FFT Result to: Magnitude Squared V^2 rms

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.ConvertComplex.ToMagnitude(System.Numerics.Complex[])
member.summary: Convert Complex DFT/FFT Result to: Magnitude Vrms

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.ConvertComplex.ToMagnitudeDBV(System.Numerics.Complex[])
member.summary: Convert Complex DFT/FFT Result to: Log Magnitude dBV

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.ConvertComplex.ToPhaseDegrees(System.Numerics.Complex[])
member.summary: Convert Complex DFT/FFT Result to: Phase in Degrees

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.ConvertComplex.ToPhaseRadians(System.Numerics.Complex[])
member.summary: Convert Complex DFT/FFT Result to: Phase in Radians

member.name: T:DSPLib.DSP.Analyze
member.summary: DFT / FFT Output Analysis Functions

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Analyze.FindRms(System.Double[],System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Find the RMS value of a[].
member.param: = Bin FROM START to start the counting at (0 based).">
= Bin FROM END to stop counting at (Max = N - 1).">
member.returns: RMS value of input array between start and stop bins.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Analyze.FindMean(System.Double[],System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Finds the mean of the input array.
member.param: = Bin FROM START to start the counting at (0 based).">
= Bin FROM END to stop counting at (Max = N - 1).">
member.returns: Mean value of input array between start and stop bins.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Analyze.FindMaxAmplitude(System.Double[])
member.summary: Finds the maximum value in an array.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Analyze.FindMaxPosition(System.Double[])
member.summary: Finds the position in the inData array where the maximum value happens.
member.returns: Position of maximum value in input array

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Analyze.FindMaxFrequency(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Finds the maximum frequency from the given inData and fSpan arrays.

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Analyze.UnwrapPhaseDegrees(System.Double[])
member.summary: Unwraps the phase so that it is continuous, without jumps.
member.param: Array of Phase Data from FT in Degrees

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Analyze.UnwrapPhaseRadians(System.Double[])
member.summary: Unwraps the phase so that it is continuous, without jumps.
member.param: Array of Phase Data from FT in Radians

member.name: T:DSPLib.DSP.Math
member.summary: Double[] Array Math Operations (All Static)

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Math.Multiply(System.Numerics.Complex[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Complex result[] = Complex a[] * Double b[]

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Math.Multiply(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: result[] = a[] * b[]

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Math.Multiply(System.Double[],System.Double)
member.summary: result[] = a[] * b

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Math.Add(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: result[] = a[] + b[]

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Math.Add(System.Double[],System.Double)
member.summary: result[] = a[] + b

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Math.Subtract(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: result[] = a[] - b[]

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Math.Subtract(System.Double[],System.Double)
member.summary: result[] = a[] - b

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Math.Divide(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: result[] = a[] / b[]

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Math.Divide(System.Double[],System.Double)
member.summary: result[] = a[] / b

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Math.Sqrt(System.Double[])
member.summary: Square root of a[].

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Math.Square(System.Double[])
member.summary: Squares a[].

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Math.Log10(System.Double[])
member.summary: Log10 a[].

member.name: M:DSPLib.DSP.Math.RemoveMean(System.Double[])
member.summary: Removes mean value from a[].
